content: Research Abacus.ai API and integration requirements
Create Abacus.ai client for model router
Update model router to use Abacus.ai as primary with local LLM fallback
Configure environment variables for Abacus.ai integration
Update Cloudflare tunnel configuration for all endpoints
Bring up full production environment (local LLM + rag-agent)
Verify all endpoints are accessible through Cloudflare tunnel
